RAIL3.SA.summary: Rumo S.A., through its subsidiaries, provides rail transportation services. It operates through four segments: Northern Operations, South Operations, Central Operations, and Container Operations. The company offers logistics services primarily for export commodities, including integrated transport solution, handling, storage, and shipment from the production centers to the southern and southeast ports. The company transports agricultural commodities, including fertilizers, corn, wheat, soy, bran, vegetable oil, and sugar; and fuel, construction, steel, forestry, consumption, petrochemical, and container products. It is also involved in the terminal and storage operations; and provides container logistics services for various cargo, including meats, wood, and other consumer goods.
